name: friends world
description:
This is a voxel style sandbox game that focuses on surviva.
You can do anything inside and destroy any block.
There is hunger and thirst, and you need to collect fruit in the wild, or hunt, farm, to survive.

Collect stones, dig wood, mine, build shelters, and make more powerful equipment to survive.

If you like playing minecraft, this is a game you must not miss.
maybe? have more! please keep an eye on the game.
